Detailed Description

FAT library header file.

High level functions, compiler directives, constants, error codes, structures, etc. that should be used to handle a FAT12/16/32 file system volume.

Definition in file fat.h.

Define Documentation

#define FS_FAT_FAT12_ENABLE

Controls whether to compile FAT12 specific program parts.

u32 fs_fat_fsize ( t_file *  handle  ) 

Get file size.

Parameters:
handle File handle to be used.
Warning:
There is no guarantee that the returned value reflects the correct physical space occupied by the file on the disk. This value only returns the size member of the directory entry which describes the file.
Returns:
File size in bytes.
